lines:
1956

TEL. 2873-1 OXFORD

CHARLES A. STEPANEK

TAILOR

DRY CLEANSING A SPECIALTY

RIDING BREECHES

14 HARRISON AVENUE near Essex St.

Boston,

Mass

AN 2191

nu s E Luk

fuit made to order

28

Please kindly advise me were

ship the fait

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Bill for $28 for a suit made for S.C. Luk and requesting Luk's shipping address.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
